item.title: Single Command to Download and Install All Bangla Fonts in Your Linux
item.description: I have created a script which will download and install 70 Bangla fonts(with variations of them) without searching. Just run this script in your Linux based PC/Laptops terminal and get all Bangla fonts instantly without hassle.
